Interface FollowerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<FollowerEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<FollowerEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<FollowerEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<FollowerEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<FollowerEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<FollowerEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<FollowerEntity, Long>
@Repository public interface FollowerRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<FollowerEntity, Long>

  • Method Details

    • findByFollowerAndFollowed

      Optional<FollowerEntity> findByFollowerAndFollowed(UserEntity follower, UserEntity followed)
      Find follower relationship

    • findByFollowerIdAndFollowedId

      @Query("SELECT f FROM FollowerEntity f WHERE f.follower.id = :followerId AND f.followed.id = :followedId") Optional<FollowerEntity> findByFollowerIdAndFollowedId(@Param("followerId") Long followerId, @Param("followedId") Long followedId)
      Find follower relationship by IDs

    • findFollowingByUserId

      @Query("SELECT f.followed FROM FollowerEntity f WHERE f.follower.id = :userId ORDER BY f.createdAt DESC") List<UserEntity> findFollowingByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get all users that a user is following

    • findFollowingByUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      @Query("SELECT f FROM FollowerEntity f JOIN FETCH f.followed WHERE f.follower.id = :userId ORDER BY f.createdAt DESC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<FollowerEntity> findFollowingByUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc(@Param("userId") Long userId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get paginated users that a user is following

    • findFollowersByUserId

      @Query("SELECT f.follower FROM FollowerEntity f WHERE f.followed.id = :userId ORDER BY f.createdAt DESC") List<UserEntity> findFollowersByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get all followers of a user

    • findFollowersByUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      @Query("SELECT f FROM FollowerEntity f JOIN FETCH f.follower WHERE f.followed.id = :userId ORDER BY f.createdAt DESC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<FollowerEntity> findFollowersByUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc(@Param("userId") Long userId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get paginated followers of a user

      void deleteByFollowerIdAndFollowedId(Long followerId, Long followedId)

    • findFollowingIdsByUserId

      @Query("SELECT f.followed.id FROM FollowerEntity f WHERE f.follower.id = :userId") List<Long> findFollowingIdsByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get user IDs that a user is following

    • findFollowerIdsByUserId

      @Query("SELECT f.follower.id FROM FollowerEntity f WHERE f.followed.id = :userId") List<Long> findFollowerIdsByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get follower IDs of a user

    • findMutualFollowing

      @Query("SELECT f1.followed FROM FollowerEntity f1 WHERE f1.follower.id = :userId1 AND EXISTS (SELECT f2 FROM FollowerEntity f2 WHERE f2.follower.id = :userId2 AND f2.followed = f1.followed)") List<UserEntity> findMutualFollowing(@Param("userId1") Long userId1, @Param("userId2") Long userId2)
      Get mutual followers between two users

    • findMostFollowedUsers

      @Query("SELECT f.followed, COUNT(f) as followerCount FROM FollowerEntity f GROUP BY f.followed ORDER BY followerCount DESC") List<Object[]> findMostFollowedUsers(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get most followed users
